A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
This is an objectively bad story with objectively nice visuals.  If it was anything but Star Wars\, it would make nothing in the box office and be on DVD in a month.

Disney knew it would tank\, which is why they forced all the theaters to show it for 4 weeks.  Good luck trying that next time\, Disney.  Could you imagine Lucasfilm having to force theaters to show "Empire Strikes Back" for 4 weeks?   That just shows you -- despite what Disney says -- they have no faith in this film and know it is crap. 

Google "Disney L.A. Times Blackout" if you want to see how this company operates\, and then tell me if they have influence over critics.
